Detailed Description

template<typename BufferType, size_t N>
class rev::BufferQueue< BufferType, N >

Class representing a set of GL buffers to be updated.

Used to implement double or triple buffering

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

◆ BufferQueue()

template<typename BufferType, size_t N>
template<typename ... BufferArgs>
rev::BufferQueue< BufferType, N >::BufferQueue ( BufferArgs &&...  args)
inline

Initialize queue however one would a buffer.

Note
Variadic template is used to avoid having to modify this if buffer initialization changes
